name: Falling Blocks - Tetris Game. Free to play, Construct 3 source code
name_original: Falling Blocks - Tetris Game. Free to play, Construct 3 source code
description:
Falling Blocks – Tetris Game is a game strongly inspired by the classic TETRIS. It was made by using the game Engine “CONSTRUCT 3”. The goal of the game is to drop down the blocks and complete as many horizontal lines as you can. Probably you know it :)

The zip file contains the construct 3 source code (It is well structured!), and the HTML5 exports, as well as a pdf file explaining a bit the source code. You can modify the source code, reskin the game and make your own version of Tetris!

NOTE: the assets in the source code are with watermark on top of them. Please personalize your game using your own assets.
